author: Harry Craddock
description: As Harry Craddock says of his own drink, "By its bitter-sweet taste this cocktail is especially suited to be a luncheon aperitif."
name: Marmalade Cocktail

recipeInstructions.text: STIR marmalade with gin in base of shaker so as to dissolve marmalade
ADD other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
